text: Mathias Bossaerts (born 10 July 1996) is a Belgian footballer. He plays as a center back. == Career == Bossaerts joined K.V. Oostende in 2016 from Manchester City. He made his Belgian Pro League debut on 27 August 2016 against Waasland-Beveren. ==References== ==External links== * *Belgium profile at Belgian FA Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football central defenders Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgian expatriate footballers Category:K.V.
